Work

If you're not here to find a good cause to give money, maybe you're looking to hire me. I'm not looking for a job right now, but in general that also rules.

I have over a decade of experience building web apps from the ground up. I focus on back end and infrastructure, but also regularly write front end code. I have worked professionally in Python, Java, Kotlin, JS, TS, and Clojure. In my free time I like to work in Rust, Haskell, Zig, and Python.

If you would like to contact me about any of that, try hiring at this domain. Otherwise, these are the more useful ways to find me.

  • GitHub
  • LinkedIn
